trans-unit.source: Runs a set of child activities according to a single defined ordering.
trans-unit.target: 运行一组子活动根据一种已定义排序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SequenceActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the SequenceActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SequenceActivity 是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，这意味着 SequenceActivity 可以包含其他活动。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SequenceActivity class coordinates the running of a set of child activities in an ordered manner, one at a time.
trans-unit.target: SequenceActivity 类协调一组的有序的方式的子活动、 一次一个地运行。

trans-unit.source: The SequenceActivity is completed when the final child activity is finished.
trans-unit.target: SequenceActivity 完成最后一个子活动后完成。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from SequenceActivity should not implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601> interface, or the derived class will not execute correctly.
trans-unit.target: 从 SequenceActivity 派生的类不应实现<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601>接口或派生的类将无法正确执行。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref>类使用活动的名称。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Cancels the execution of the activity.
The execution context of the activity.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> of the activity after canceling the execution.
Executes the activity.
The execution context of the activity.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> of the activity after executing the activity.
Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此实例的执行上下文中引发异常时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
The <xref:System.Exception> which caused this fault.
The execution status of the activity.
Called when an activity is removed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, determines the action taken by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> when the activity has completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，确定执行的操作<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref>活动完成执行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
executionContext is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: executionContext为空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: Called after changes have been made to the collection <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 对集合进行了更改后调用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>的此实例。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
To be added.
